pages.text: Fresh & Delicious Order Now Fast & Easy Ordering Order Now Authentic Mexican Cuisine Order Now 808 Folly Rd, Charleston, SC 29412 (843) 406-4919 About Us We’re blending our passion for making delicious food with our extensive knowledge of our cuisine to create authentic and classic dishes for your enjoyment. We use the freshest, locally-sourced ingredients and promise to give your taste buds something to be excited about. Thank you for ordering directly from our website which helps us to provide the best service with a focus on top-quality ingredients. Enjoy your next meal to go-you will not be disappointed! We are located along 808 Folly Rd, Charleston, SC 29412 Our Menu Special Offers Available When You Create an Account and Order Online 10% Off First Online Order • $5 Off Every $100 Spent Online • Order Now Reviews carrie meza We've gotten take out for lunch and enjoyed it, and decided to go in for dinner. So glad we did! Had already fallen in love with the homemade salsas, and were not disappointed in dinner. It was the best molcajete I've had! The staff are friendly, service was good. We sat at the bar. Will definitely be back regularly for their delicious, well made food. Brian Birkenstock The restaurant was beautifully decorated and the service was great. They were really good about refilling our drinks and as soon as the food came out it looked so delicious. It was all really good and tasty. Definitely recommend. Kris M Great food and atmosphere! We’re visiting Charleston and wanted something besides seafood. Found this place and tried it out. This place is so cute, had great food, and the service was excellent! I highly recommend! I.E. Xam The steak fajitas were very good. A dinner companion enjoyed the chimichangas. Expansive drink list including about 12 different margaritas. Also has draft beer. Lots of traditional mexican food items including tacos burritos enchiladas etc. Excellent service. Philip Antman Great food, amazing service, great prices! Best tomatillo salsa in Charleston. I recommend the street tacos, carnitas, or the shrimp al diablo. I'm a Mexican food connoisseur and I love this place. Nikki Rucker The food is consistent, and our servers are always attentive and fun! They feel like family and I enjoy their company. The interior is fun and comfortable!
